title: #ClouderaLife Spotlight: Shane Prendergast, HR Services Manager, EMEA
How to Force a Recall Election for the SF School Board
description: It is difficult for children, especially young children, to learn over Zoom. It is more difficult to teach critical skills like learning to read and write over Zoom. As Heather Knight and others have noted, keeping children isolated has severe impacts on their mental health. It is the Mayor's top priority to get children back [â€¦]
